mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp( emp_id, ct_no, cust_no, dept_id, job_no, emp_no, pw, emp_name, hire_dt, emp_stat, emp_addr1, emp_tel, email_addr ) SELECT cust_no || '000' , #{ctNo} , cust_no , #{deptId} , #{jobNo} , '000' , #{pw} , rep , SYSDATE , '1D1d' , SUBSTR(cust_addr, -6, 5) , cust_tel , cust_no||'000@'||cust_no||'yedam' FROM cust where cust_no = #{custNo}
